column4: Hey, I really need some help. I  had a document open in openoffice writer and the power went out. I restarted my computer and tried to recover the document, but it says "recovery failed". is there any possible way I can recover it?
if it couild have recovered, it would have. That's a good reason to save your documents often
were you saving the file just as the power went out?
No, but it autosaves sometimes, so I'm thinking maybe that's what happened.
